channel.title: Climbing on Wesley Tian
channel.description: Recent content in Climbing on Wesley Tian

item.title: Climbing Mt. Olympus
item.description: Pic: View from Mt. Olympus Pic: Sunrise at Refuge A I always like to plan things out before I do them. Especially with hiking mountains in a country of which language I did not know, it was especially crucial for me to plan things out before hand. I searched online and found close to nothing that would help me prepare for Mt. Olympus. I basically went to Greece with no knowledge of Mt.

item.title: Climbing the Half Dome
item.description: It’s been nearly a whole year since I summited the half dome in Yosemite Valley National Park. One of my favorite hiking adventures of all time, below is the journal entry that I wrote after the hike. Table of Contents The Ascent The Descent Review Afterword Half Dome, Yosemite National Park, California. Look familiar? That’s because it’s a default desktop wallpaper for Apple computers and it was the inspiration for the North Face logo.
